CWEs: CWE-79: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting')
description: The function is vulnerable to Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) attacks. It takes an input (tElement) and directly uses it to generate HTML content without properly sanitizing it. An attacker could inject malicious scripts through the tElement input, which would then be executed when the generated HTML is rendered in a web browser.
